languages.text: {n}В голову приходит простая и очевидная мысль: вычурный наряд, нарочито дерзкое поведение и рассказы о ценных грузах — не что иное, как пускание пыли в глаза. Скорее всего Джай — мелкая контрабандистка, жаждущая присосаться к рыбке покрупнее. У нее не получилось обработать Владайма, но вы ей не менее интересны.{/n}

{n}A simple and obvious thought occurs to you: the ostentatious outfit, the deliberately brash behaviour, the tales about valuable cargo — it is all smoke and mirrors. Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В голову приходит простая и очевидная мысль: вычурный наряд, нарочито дерзкое поведение и рассказы о ценных грузах — не что иное, как пускание пыли в глаза. Скорее всего Джай — мелкая контрабандистка, жаждущая присосаться к рыбке покрупнее. У нее не получилось обработать Владайма, но вы ей не менее интересны.{/n}

Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}

Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}婕伊那招摇的着装，充满做作的傲慢行为，还有所谓关于“贵重货物”的故事，这一切让你都得出了简单而明显的结论——这一切都不过是障眼法罢了。真相很可能是这样的：婕伊不过是个卑微的走私犯，打算吸引大人物的目光。她的话没能引起弗拉迪姆的兴趣，于是把目光投向了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A simple and obvious thought occurs to you: the ostentatious outfit, the deliberately brash behaviour, the tales about valuable cargo — it is all smoke and mirrors. Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊那招摇的着装，充满做作的傲慢行为，还有所谓关于“贵重货物”的故事，这一切让你都得出了简单而明显的结论——这一切都不过是障眼法罢了。真相很可能是这样的：婕伊不过是个卑微的走私犯，打算吸引大人物的目光。她的话没能引起弗拉迪姆的兴趣，于是把目光投向了你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se te ocurre algo muy sencillo y evidente: la ropa ostentosa, el comportamiento arrogante y las historias de cargamentos valiosos son todo un farol. Lo más probable es que Jae sea una contrabandista de tercera buscando arrimarse a buen árbol. Acaba de fallar con Vladaym y ha decidido intentarlo contigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A simple and obvious thought occurs to you: the ostentatious outfit, the deliberately brash behaviour, the tales about valuable cargo — it is all smoke and mirrors. Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se te ocurre algo muy sencillo y evidente: la ropa ostentosa, el comportamiento arrogante y las historias de cargamentos valiosos son todo un farol. Lo más probable es que Jae sea una contrabandista de tercera buscando arrimarse a buen árbol. Acaba de fallar con Vladaym y ha decidido intentarlo contigo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}単純かつ明快な考えが浮かんだ。すなわち、その仰々しい服装も、わざとらしい振る舞いも、貴重な貨物の話も…すべては見せかけにすぎないのだ。おそらくジェイは、より大物に取り入ろうと躍起になっている、大した力も持たない密輸人なのだろう。彼女はヴラダイムを相手にした交渉で失敗し、今度はあなたに狙いを定めたというわけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A simple and obvious thought occurs to you: the ostentatious outfit, the deliberately brash behaviour, the tales about valuable cargo — it is all smoke and mirrors. Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}単純かつ明快な考えが浮かんだ。すなわち、その仰々しい服装も、わざとらしい振る舞いも、貴重な貨物の話も…すべては見せかけにすぎないのだ。おそらくジェイは、より大物に取り入ろうと躍起になっている、大した力も持たない密輸人なのだろう。彼女はヴラダイムを相手にした交渉で失敗し、今度はあなたに狙いを定めたというわけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soudain, tout s'éclaire : la tenue clinquante, l'impertinence, les histoires de marchandises de valeur... Tout cela n'est que de la poudre aux yeux. Selon toute vraisemblance, Jae n'est qu'une contrebandière de petite envergure à l'ambition démesurée. Décidée à ferrer un gros poisson, elle a tenté de s'en prendre à Vladaym, en vain. Et maintenant, c'est votre tour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A simple and obvious thought occurs to you: the ostentatious outfit, the deliberately brash behaviour, the tales about valuable cargo — it is all smoke and mirrors. Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, tout s'éclaire : la tenue clinquante, l'impertinence, les histoires de marchandises de valeur... Tout cela n'est que de la poudre aux yeux. Selon toute vraisemblance, Jae n'est qu'une contrebandière de petite envergure à l'ambition démesurée. Décidée à ferrer un gros poisson, elle a tenté de s'en prendre à Vladaym, en vain. Et maintenant, c'est votre tour.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir kommt ein simpler und offensichtlicher Gedanke: Die auffällige Kleidung, das bewusst kühne Verhalten, die Geschichten von wertvoller Fracht ... das ist alles ist nur Tarnung und Ablenkung. Vermutlich ist Jae eine unbedeutende kleine Schmugglerin, die sich an einen größeren Fisch heften will. Bei Vladaym ist sie gescheitert, nun versucht sie ihr Glück bei dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A simple and obvious thought occurs to you: the ostentatious outfit, the deliberately brash behaviour, the tales about valuable cargo — it is all smoke and mirrors. Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}

Vermutlich ist Jae eine unbedeutende kleine Schmugglerin, die sich an einen größeren Fisch heften will. Bei Vladaym ist sie gescheitert, nun versucht sie ihr Glück bei dir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aklına basit ve bariz bir düşünce geliyor: Fiyakalı kıyafet, kasten sergilediği küstah tavırlar, değerli kargo masalları... Bunların hepsi göz boyamaca. Jae büyük ihtimalle, koca bir balığa yanlamaya çalışan ufak çaplı kaçakçının teki. Vladaym'ı ağına düşürmeyi beceremeyince hâliyle gözünü sana dikti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A simple and obvious thought occurs to you: the ostentatious outfit, the deliberately brash behaviour, the tales about valuable cargo — it is all smoke and mirrors. Most likely, Jae is a small-time smuggler eager to latch onto a bigger fish. She failed with Vladaym and now she has set her sights on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aklına basit ve bariz geliyor: Gösterişli kıyafeti, kasten arsız oluşu, değerli kargo masalları... Bunların hepsi alavere dalavere. Jae büyük bir ihtimalle ufak çaplı kaçakçının teki ve çok daha büyük avlar peşinde. Vladaym'ı eline düşürmeyi becerememiş; şimdi de gözünü sana dikmiş.{/n}
